# vcf_cluster_personality (Data Source)

This data source retrieves compute cluster images (personalities) based on their display names.

It can be used to apply existing images, even if not exported via Terraform, to new infrastructure. 

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The display name of the personality

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
